Articles.Content: I just bought and tried the PS4 version, but have wondered about this in the 3 years I've been playing PC version as well.  When in the map view during a flight, I would love for the PE and AP altitude values to be displayed constantly.  It's a much bigger deal in the console version than PC because one needs to switch the controller from flight controls to UI controls in order to hover the 'mouse' over the nodes to show the altitude tooltips, then if one wants to adjust orbit, one has to switch the controller back from UI to flight, thus losing the tooltip. I can only image how impossible it will be to set up a precise orbit in the console versions.  Having the altitudes always showing would definitely help out, when using the flight controls in map mode.
Should be a keypress for it, you're right. Do they still stay up when you mouseclick them in 1.1?
